Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from FGF-4 signal sequence)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.21220525]Influenza virus:inhibit hemagglutination of 64 HA units of virus of MDCK cells(97 ± 2% inhibition at 10 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide inhibits influenza virus replication by preventing attachment to cells.

Literature.Title: Identification of the minimal active sequence of an anti-influenza virus peptide.
Literature.Author: Jones JC, Settles EW, Brandt CR, Schultz-Cherry S.
